dcterms:creator: Ruilong Li
Yuhang Huang
Hao Zhang
Yifan Zhang
Zheng Zhang
dcterms:description: The AIST++ dataset contains 1408 dance sequences performed by 30 dancers paired with music from 10 genres with basic and advanced choreographies at 60FPS. The dataset has motion sequence lengths ranging from 7 seconds to 50 seconds with an average length of 13 seconds.
dcterms:title: AIST++

dcterms:creator: Chuan Guo
Yuhang Huang
Hao Zhang
Zheng Zhang
dcterms:description: The HumanML3D dataset contains 14,616 human motion sequences at 20FPS and 44,970 text descriptions. Pre-processing used to generate the dataset is also applied to AIST++ motions to form a combined dataset with 32048 motion sequences spanning 86 hours.
dcterms:title: HumanML3D
